title: Native Instruments Solid Dynamics v1.1.1 Update-R2R [deepstatus]
description:
Native Instruments Solid Dynamics v1.1.1 Update









SOLID DYNAMICS is an exceptional stereo compressor with a gate/expander module Ã¢â‚¬â€œ ideal for processing dynamic range on single channels before they hit the master section. Available separately or as a part of the SOLID MIX SERIES bundle, SOLID DYNAMICS delivers clear, musical results via a clean and easy-to-use new interface. Now running as a stand-alone plug-in in any DAW, itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s never been easier to master your dynamics.

* All-in-one tool for total control over dynamics
* Add professional punch and clarity in seconds
* Runs as a stand-alone plug-in in any DAW

CLEAN AND WARM

SOLID DYNAMICS is a clean, responsive, and musical effect for a wide range of uses, particularly drums, vocals and gating noise floors. The compressor delivers a healthy combination of clean and warm with three simple controls: Ratio, Threshold and Release. The knee characteristic is switchable from soft to hard, and you can also switch between two attack modes (slow and fast) and two release modes (linear and logarithmic).

The expander/gate module allows you to manage the noise floor on a track to eliminate unwanted background noise such as headphone bleed. A gate is also extremely useful for making drums sound more direct, and you can use multiple gates to control bleed levels across multiple mics.





SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS

Windows: Windows 8, Windows 7 (latest Service Pack, 32/64 Bit), Intel Core Duo or AMD Athlon 64 X2, 2 GB RAM (4 GB recommended)

For use with Any host / DAW as a plug-in




Installation

[Update]
1.Burn or mount the image.
2.Install the update.
3.Enjoy!

[New Install]
1.Run our NI_InstReg tool.
2.Burn or mount the image.
3.Install.
4.Enjoy!
